casebody.data:
ATLANTIC MARINE CONSTRUCTION COMPANY, INC., petitioner,
v.
UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT FOR the WESTERN DISTRICT OF TEXAS, et al. No. 12-929. Supreme Court of the United States Oct. 01, 2013.

Motion of Professor Stephen E. Sachs for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument denied. Parties, however, should be prepared to address at oral argument the arguments raised in the brief of Professor Stephen E. Sachs as amicus curiae in support of neither party.
